    Cisco Technical Writing Portfolio

    This portfolio showcases my work as a Lead Technical Writer at Cisco, where I developed end-to-end technical content for enterprise networking, Kubernetes platforms, hyperconverged infrastructure (HCI), and cloud-managed infrastructure. I specialized in API documentation, configuration workflows, and scalable documentation systems that support engineering and customer success teams.

    Key Contributions:

    • Created developer-focused content including installation and configuration guides, REST API references, workflow guides, and technical whitepapers across multiple Cisco product lines.
    • Defined and implemented content strategy for several networking and cloud products, ensuring consistency, scalability, and alignment with engineering and product goals.
    • Built and maintained internal knowledge bases for Cisco TAC to streamline troubleshooting and reduce case-resolution time.
    • Developed automated documentation publishing pipelines, integrating authoring tools with CI/CD systems to accelerate release cycles and improve content quality.
    • Enabled organization-wide GitHub adoption, training and onboarding 20+ writers on Git workflows, content repositories, and collaborative authoring practices.

    Cisco HyperFlex HX-Series

    Cisco HyperFlex HX-Series is a fully integrated, hyperconverged infrastructure platform that unifies compute, storage, and networking into a single, scalable system. Built on the Cisco UCS architecture and powered by the Cisco HX Data Platform, HyperFlex delivers a high-performance, distributed file system with a single point of connectivity for simplified operations.

    Designed for flexibility, the HX-Series scales seamlessly by adding HX nodes within one UCS management domain. The platform provides a unified resource pool that adapts dynamically to application and workload requirements, making it ideal for virtualized environments, enterprise applications, and cloud-ready deployments.

    Cisco HyperFlex Installation Guide for VMWare ESXi

    Developed the official, comprehensive installation guide for Cisco HyperFlex on VMware ESXi. The content covered all phases including prerequisites, cluster setup, networking, and storage. Architected the content to provide prescriptive, step-by-step best practices, enabling system administrators to execute reliable, error-free deployments.

    Cisco HyperFlex Installation Guide for VMWare ESXi

    Cisco HyperFlex API Reference

    Developed end-to-end REST API documentation covering HyperFlex networking components, including interface configuration, VLAN workflows, and cluster-level network operations. Samples:

    • HyperFlex Core Functionalities
    • HyperFlex REST API for Backup Service

    Cisco HyperFlex Upgrade Guide for VMWare ESXi

    Authored version upgrade procedures, pre-check/post-check workflows, failure recovery steps, alert references, and cluster-health dashboards.

    Cisco HyperFlex Upgrade Guide for VMWare ESXi

    Cisco Intersight

    Cisco Intersight is a cloud-based operations platform that provides modular, scalable services for infrastructure and workload optimization. It delivers end-to-end lifecycle management for distributed environments, including deployment, monitoring, configuration, and support for both physical and virtual infrastructure.

    Cisco Intersight Kubernetes Service (IKS) — Admin Guide

    IKS integrates the Kubernetes lifecycle management capabilities of Cisco into the Intersight orchestration platform to offer Kubernetes as a service. It enables you to quickly and easily deploy and manage the lifecycle of Kubernetes clusters across the globe using a single cloud portal—Intersight.

    Intersight Kubernetes Service

    Cisco Intersight HyperFlex Systems

    Wrote workflows covering cluster physcial topology, initialization, configuration, and deployment.

    Cisco HyperFlex cluster deployment

    Cisco Intersight API Reference

    Produced API documentation that supports cluster automation, node operations, workload scheduling, data protection, and monitoring endpoints.

    Cisco Intersight RESTful API

    About My Work at Cisco

    I worked closely with:

    • Product engineering (HyperFlex, Intersight, Kubernetes Service)
    • API and backend platform teams
    • Networking and systems engineers
    • Cloud service and platform operations teams

    I specialized in:

    • REST API documentation
    • Developer workflows and lifecycle management content
    • Cluster ops, orchestration, and infrastructure automation
    • Enterprise networking deployment and integration guides
    • Cloud-managed systems (Cisco Intersight)
    • Hyperconverged storage and compute systems (HyperFlex)

    This portfolio represents a selection of my published work in these areas.
